article_title: In war against Obamacare, Bentley buffers his bunker with Alabama's poorest people (JD Crowe)
article_text:
Gov. Bentley's anti-Obamacare/Medicaid expansion ranting scores well with his base, and he will likely be re-elected. But let's hope he has a change of heart.





He may as well buffer his bunker with the state's poorest people, because they are the ones hurt most by his political posturing.





JD Crowe is the statewide cartoonist for Alabama Media Group.

article_summary:
He may as well buffer his bunker with the state's poorest people, because they are the ones hurt most by his political posturing.
Bentley's anti-Obamacare/Medicaid expansion ranting scores well with his base, and he will likely be re-elected.
JD Crowe is the statewide cartoonist for Alabama Media Group.
But let's hope he has a change of heart.
